hotel_description:
Offering city views, Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg is an accommodation located in Sélestat, 21 km from Colmar Expo and 24 km from House of the Heads. It is set 14 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and offers free WiFi plus a 24-hour front desk.

The 3-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 24 km from the apartment, while Colmar Train Station is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg.

Hotel La Mirabelle is located in Rheinhausen, 4 km from the Europa-Park.

All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rheinhausen, like hiking.

Strasbourg is 40 km from Hotel La Mirabelle, while Colmar is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Baden Airpark Airport, 67 km from the hotel.

Situated in Ringsheim, 5.7 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, FourSide Hotel Ringsheim features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a bar. Located around 34 km from Freiburg Cathedral, the hotel with free WiFi is also 36 km away from Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 30 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. All rooms have a safety deposit box.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at FourSide Hotel Ringsheim.

The accommodation offers a children's playground.

Würth Museum is 36 km from FourSide Hotel Ringsheim, while Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 42 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 52 km from the hotel.

The restaurant "Le Comptoir d'Henri" offers traditional French and Alsatian cuisine prepared with fresh produce from the market. The restaurant is serving a buffet from seasonal and traditional products. It is open from Tuesday to Saturday included, from 6:45pm to 9:30pm.
During the Christmas markets, our restaurant will be open everyday of the week, from 6:45pm to 9:30pm (from the  24/12/2023 to 23/12/2023 included).

For your information, our restaurant Le Comptoir d'Henri will be fully closed from the 07/01/2024 to the 11/03/2024 included, we will re-open our restaurant for dinner on the 12/03/2024.

There is also a bar "L'Eclipse" which is open from 4pm to midnight.

The Highway Hotel is easily accessible off highway A 5, halfway between the city of Offenburg and Freiburg.

Whether you would like to relax or plan business meetings, our hotel offers the suitable ambiance for each occasion.

Located directly on the market square by the town hall in the historical part of Herbolzheim, Parkside Boutique Appartements offers modern and luxury apartments. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site for a surcharge.

These spacious and non-smoking apartments offer fully-equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, coffee machine and a water kettle. Satellite TV can also be found in the room. Towels are provided.

Parkside Boutique Appartements offers an ideal location for various day trips to the neighbouring countries of France and Switzerland as well as to Freiburg or the Europa Park amusement park. Guests can reach the city of Freiburg by car within 20 minutes. The famous Europa Park in Rust can be reachable by car in 10 minutes.

Colmar is 35 km from Parkside Boutique Appartements. The nearest airport is Baden Airpark Airport, 66 km from the property.

This hotel is located directly opposite the entrance of Europa-Park in Rust. There are snacks and drinks available in the hotel shop. On-site parking is free.

The bright and spacious rooms at Hotel am Park feature wooden interiors. All rooms include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A traditional German breakfast is available each morning.

Tickets for Europa-Park can be reserved at the Hotel am Park in Rust. All children are welcome at the Hotel.

Hotel am Park is 4 km from the A5 motorway. It is a 30-minute drive from both Freiburg and Strasbourg.

Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

This family-run hotel is 150 metres from the entrance of the Rust Europa-Park.

Free on-site parking and a rich breakfast are provided at the Gästehaus Parkblick. The bright rooms feature rich wooden furniture and satellite TV.

The A5 motorway is 3 km away and provides a connection to Freiburg in 20 minutes.

hotel_name: Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica
hotel_description:
Situated in Ringsheim, 6 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. The property is set 34 km from Freiburg Cathedral, 36 km from Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station and 36 km from Würth Museum. The property is allergy-free and is located 31 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre.

At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms include a balcony. At Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica all rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast.

Guests at Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ringsheim, like hiking and cycling.

Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 42 km from the hotel, while Colmar Expo is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 52 km from Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica.

Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel is situated in a verdant setting just 1 km from the city centre of Colmar and its historical sites and attractions.

All of the standard guest rooms feature modern en suite facilities, TV and free optic fibre WiFi internet access. There are also connecting rooms.

This hotel is a great starting point for discovering La Route des Vins, the local picturesque villages and leisure parks. Not to mention the regional cuisine and local wine.

The hotel also offers a free private car park, a garage for bicycles, an outdoor terrace, and veranda where guests can enjoy breakfast or a moment of quiet.

hotel_name: Best Western Hotel & SPA Le Schoenenbourg
hotel_description:
Surrounded by vineyards, the Best Western Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is opposite the ramparts of the medieval village of Riquewihr. This eco-friendly hotel features a complimentary spa area with an indoor pool, saunas and hammam as well as a seasonal outdoor pool. Riquewihr Christmas Market is 170 meters away.

Each room is decorated in neutral colours. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Please note that the restaurant is open.

Additional facilities at the Best Western include a bar. Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast in the dining area or on the outdoor terrace overlooking the garden.

Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is 13 km from Colmar, 28 km from the border of Germany and 53 minutes from Strasbourg. Guests can go hiking in the Réserve Naturelle du Massif du Ventron.

hotel_name: Résidence Les Rives de la Fecht - Colmar Ouest
hotel_description:
Located at the beginning of the Alsace Wine Route, this residence is set in a small forest with views of the Vosges Mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. Riquewihr and Colmar Exhibition Centre are a 10-minute drive away.

The apartments and studios at Résidence Les Rives de la Fetch have a seating area with an LCD TV. Bed linen and towels are provided once and free of charge.

Meals can be prepared in your accommodation’s kitchenette, which is equipped with an oven and hotplates. Alternatively the residence offers a buffet breakfast and also has a restaurant, Aux Berges de la Fecht.

Massage treatments can be arranged at the property. Free private parking is available on site. Other local villages include Kaysersberg and Ribeauvillé, both less than a 15-minute drive away.

The Oriel is located in the heart of the historic Alsatian town of Riquewihr. Riquewihr Christmas Market is 91 meters away.

Each guestroom has a private bathroom, TV and free WiFi access.

Guests of the Hotel à l'Oriel can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar or on the terrace. The hotel also offers a breakfast which can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room, or in the courtyard.

The Hotel à l’Oriel is located 12 km from Colmar and guests can visit the nearby Alsatian vineyards and enjoy hiking and cycling in the scenic countryside surrounding the hotel.

hotel_name: AVALON ideal gelegen zwischen Europapark und Rulantica
hotel_description:
Set in Rust in the Baden-Württemberg region, with Europa-Park Main Entrance nearby, AVALON ideal gelegen zwischen Europapark und Rulantica offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking.

Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and bathrobes. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the aparthotel.

AVALON ideal gelegen zwischen Europapark und Rulantica offers a terrace.

Cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre is 32 km from the accommodation, while Freiburg Cathedral is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 55 km from AVALON ideal gelegen zwischen Europapark und Rulantica.

Ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville is set in the Colmar Centre Ville district in Colmar, 300 metres from House of the Heads and 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

Colmar Expo is 2.5 km from ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville, while Theater Colmar is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from the property.

The Gouverneur Hotel is ideally located in the heart of the town of Obernai, in the Alsation region. The property is 350 meters from Saints Pierre et Paul Church. The hotel offers free WiFi access.

The guest rooms are all soundproofed and individually decorated. All rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. They surround a central courtyard.

The Gouverneur Hotel also serves a buffet breakfast, which can be taken on the terrace during summer time.

Free public parking is available behind the hotel and a limited number of private parking spaces are available for an extra charge. The property is 32 km from Strasbourg.

Featuring free WiFi and a restaurant, Châtenois, 2.2 km from Monkey Mountain and 3 km from Cigoland Attraction Park.

The rooms include a flat-screen TV, a kettle and a private bathroom with fee toiletries and a hairdryer.

A selection of activities are offered in the area, such as horse riding and cycling. Strasbourg International Airport is 35 km from the property.

hotel_name: Hôtel du Haut Koenigsbourg- entre vignes et château
hotel_description:
This hotel de charme offers en suite accommodation within the Ballons des Vosges Regional Park. It is situated in the scenic village of Thannenkirch, in the Alsace region.

Garden views are available from the bright guest rooms, which have queen-size beds. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in all rooms. Private bathrooms are equipped with amenities and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and can be taken on the terrace in warmer weather.

Guests at Haut Koenigsbourg have access to a lounge with a TV, video games and a range of books. Free Wi-Fi is accessible from this lounge.

Haut Koenigsbourg Chateau is 7.1 km from the hotel. Ribeauvillé Train Station is 10 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

Located on the Alsace Wine Route, Hotel Kieffer offers rooms with free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV. It is possible to arrange wine-tasting with the owner.

Each room includes a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries. Some rooms also have a balcony or terrace. A continental breakfast is available daily for a supplement of EUR 14 per person.

Free private parking is possible on site at the Hotel Kieffer. The property is 35 km from Strasbourg and Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 20 km away.

Situated in Ammerschwihr, AUX DEUX CIGOGNES AMMERSCHWIHR features mountain views and free WiFi, 8.5 km from House of the Heads and 9 km from Colmar Expo.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, an equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some rooms feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 9 km from the apartment, while Colmar Train Station is 9.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 65 km from AUX DEUX CIGOGNES AMMERSCHWIHR.

Boasting quiet street views, la grange de louis features accommodation with a patio and a coffee machine, around 6.6 km from House of the Heads. It has barbecue facilities, inner courtyard views and free WiFithroughout the property.

The holiday home has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views.

The holiday home offers a children's playground. Skiing and hiking can be enjoyed nearby, while a bicycle rental service and ski storage space are also available on site.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 7.1 km from la grange de louis, while Colmar Train Station is 7.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 62 km from the accommodation.

Hotel Le Ménestrel is located on the wine route in Ribeauvillé, 500 metres from the historic district. It offers a spa centre and a garden with terrace overlooking the vineyard.

All rooms have a contemporary décor and are equipped with a flat-screen TV and Wi-Fi access. Each room has a private bathroom. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

Guests at the Le Ménestrel Hotel can enjoy a drink at the bar or relax in the bright lounge. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room or on the furnished terrace.

Activities nearby includes hiking, cycling and a casino. With free private parking on site, Colmar is 15 km away and the German border is a 40-minute drive away.

hotel_name: Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent
hotel_description:
Located in Colmar, just 1.6 km from the train station, Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent offers a fitness room and swimming pool with counter-current and massage jets. The property is 700 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 1 km from House of the Heads.

The accommodation features a seating area, flat-screen TV, wardrobe and private bathroom with a bath or shower. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and refrigerator.

A breakfast is available each morning at Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent and children can enjoy it at a reduced cost.  Restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the accommodation.

Additional features include free WiFi access throughout and private parking is available upon prior reservation. Colmar Expo Centre is 3.3 km away and Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport is located 54 km from the accommodation.

Located in Ringsheim, the newly built Hotel La Toscana Nähe Europapark offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The property was newly opened in March 2018. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The property provides a 24-hour front desk.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Strasbourg is 37 km from Hotel La Toscana Nähe Europapark, while Colmar is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Baden Airpark Airport, 63 km from the accommodation.

Since May 2023 we have opened our hotel's own Italian buffet restaurant Villa Italia.

From June 2023, the Bar Don Michele will also be available to our guests every day from 8 p.m. to drink delicious cocktails or end the evening with a glass of wine.
hotel_description

This family-friendly hotel in Rust offers free parking and free WiFi throughout. It lies in a quiet side street, 5 minutes from the A5 motorway and a 10-minute walk from Europa-Park.

The non-smoking Hotel Apollon Rust provides bright, soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen cable TV and a safe. All rooms include a refrigerator and adjustable air conditioning.

A varied breakfast buffet is provided each morning. Live music and entertainment can be enjoyed in the evenings in the Europa Park Hotel Resorts, 2 minutes' walk away. We also offer a shuttle from our hotel to Europa Park.

Various shopping opportunities can be found within 5 minutes' walk.

Located in the heart of Colmar, ideally situated between Colmar Cathedral and the main streets, COLMARAPPART Grand'Rue offers self-catering apartments and suites.

All apartments and suites are accessed by a lift and include a TV, WiFi access and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

Guests are able to prepare their own meals at COLMARAPPART Grand'Rue. Each accommodation type has a kitchen with kitchenware, a microwave and a fridge. A dishwasher is also provided.

The accommodation is located in a pedestrian street within easy reach of restaurants, bars and grocery stores. Limited parking places are available at an extra charge and upon prior request. The parking is also subject to availability.

Boasting mountain views, Chambre d'Hôtes "Au Vigneron" offers accommodation with a terrace and a coffee machine, around 20 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle. With garden views, this accommodation provides a balcony.

With free WiFi, this homestay features a satellite flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are available in the homestay.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the homestay.

Chambre d'Hôtes "Au Vigneron" can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area.

The accommodation offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a spa facilities. Skiing and cycling can be enjoyed nearby, while a ski equipment rental service and a ski pass sales point are also available on site.

Colmar Expo is 31 km from Chambre d'Hôtes "Au Vigneron", while Würth Museum is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 37 km from the homestay.

Offering city views, Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg is an accommodation located in Sélestat, 21 km from Colmar Expo and 24 km from House of the Heads. It is set 14 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and offers free WiFi plus a 24-hour front desk.

The 3-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 24 km from the apartment, while Colmar Train Station is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg.

Located in Ringsheim, the newly built Hotel La Toscana Nähe Europapark offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The property was newly opened in March 2018. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The property provides a 24-hour front desk.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Strasbourg is 37 km from Hotel La Toscana Nähe Europapark, while Colmar is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Baden Airpark Airport, 63 km from the accommodation.

Since May 2023 we have opened our hotel's own Italian buffet restaurant Villa Italia.

From June 2023, the Bar Don Michele will also be available to our guests every day from 8 p.m. to drink delicious cocktails or end the evening with a glass of wine.

The 3-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Providing free private parking, this 4-star apartment also features free WiFithroughout the property.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

This hotel is located in the centre of Ribeauvillé, 100 metres from Ribeauvillé Forest. It offers non-smoking rooms with free WiFi and a bar.

The guest rooms are equipped with a telephone and cable TV with over 200 channels. Each room features a private bathroom.

The bar at Hotel Au Lion serves regional cheese, cold meats and Flammekueche that guests can enjoy on the south-facing terrace during nice weather.

Haut-Koenigsbourg Castle is 14 km from Au Lion hotel and Colmar is 16 km away. The hotel provides a shuttle service to and from certain train stations and airports at an extra cost. Private parking for motorbikes is available with an extra cost.

Haut Koenigsbourg Chateau is 7.1 km from the hotel. Ribeauvillé Train Station is 10 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

The Gouverneur Hotel is ideally located in the heart of the town of Obernai, in the Alsation region. The property is 350 meters from Saints Pierre et Paul Church. The hotel offers free WiFi access.

Boasting city views, Chambre Le Hupsa Pfannala features accommodation with a terrace and a coffee machine, around 7.1 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle. The bed and breakfast has access to a restaurant and free WiFithroughout the property.

The bed and breakfast features a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the bed and breakfast.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the bed and breakfast.

Colmar Expo is 17 km from Chambre Le Hupsa Pfannala, while House of the Heads is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 48 km from the accommodation.

Le Galtz - GÎTES MARCK is located in Ammerschwihr, 13 km from House of the Heads, 14 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, and 14 km from Colmar Expo. Guests benefit from a balcony and a children's playground.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Providing free private parking, this 2-star apartment also features free WiFi.

If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Colmar Train Station is 15 km from Le Galtz - GÎTES MARCK, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 33 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 72 km from the accommodation.

Hotel Andante Rust is placed between Europa-Park and the new Rulantica Water World. It offers 4-star accommodation with a restaurant, bar and a garden.

The rooms at the hotel come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

A breakfast buffet is served every day at the hotel. During the summer months, guests can relax on the terrace. The restaurant at Hotel Andante Rust serves Italian, German and international meals.

Guests can take relaxing walks and bike rides in the area or visit the neighbouring Europa-Park. Guests can also play table tennis at the accommodation.

The hotel offers a paid shuttle service to Europa-Park and Rulantica Water World.

The Hotel Le Mandelberg is located at the foot of a hill in the village of Mittelwihr, in the heart of the Alsace region. It offers a sauna and a solarium, and  massage treatments are available upon request.

Each room at the Mandelberg is individually decorated with a private bathroom, a minibar and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

The Mandelberg serves a daily buffet breakfast, and guests are invited to relax with a drink in the bar or on the terrace.

The hotel is in close proximity to many vineyards and free on-site parking is available.

Situated 650 metres from the centre of Colmar in the heart of Alsace, this hotel offers free WiFi access and a lounge area. The Exhibition Park is just 1 km away.

With flat-screen TVs, satellite channels, all spacious rooms at Kyriad Colmar Centre Unterlinden feature a modern decor and a welcome tray. All en suite bathrooms are equipped with hairdryers.

Every morning a buffet-style breakfast is served and meal trays can be requested.

On-site parking is free of charge subject to availability and the Colmar Train Station is 2 km away. Strasbourg is a 1-hour drive away and the Colmar Airport is 3 km from the hotel.

This family-run hotel is situated in the medieval town of Riquewihr, in the heart of the Alsatian vineyards. It has an indoor pool, sauna and secure parking.

The rooms and suites include free Wi-Fi internet access and air conditioning.  Some rooms have a balcony with views of the surrounding countryside.

Hotel Le Riquewihr serves a daily buffet breakfast in the dining area, which can also be taken in the guest room upon request.  Guests can relax with a drink in the bar or on the terrace.

In addition to the indoor swimming pool, guests have access to a fitness centre and a range of massages.

Free private parking is available for guests exploring the Alsace Wine Route by car.  Colmar is 25 km from Le Riquewihr Hotel.

hotel_name: Résidence Pierre & Vacances La Petite Venise
hotel_description:
Located in the heart of Colmar in the Little Venice district, Pierre & Vacances La Petite Venise offers an indoor swimming pool with paddling pool and garden with play area. Colmar Train Station is 650 meters away.

Each accommodation is decorated in a contemporary style and features a seating area and TV. Most offer a balcony or terrace, upon availability. The kitchen is equipped with an oven or microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator.

A breakfast can be enjoyed each morning at an extra cost in the property's breakfast room, which also features a terrace. Baked goods can be delivered to your room and must be ordered the evening before at reception.

Eguisheim is 10 km away and Bâle-Mulhouse-Fribourg Airport is 56 km from the accommodation.

Offering barbecue facilities and garden view, Gîte Les Cerisiers is set in Triembach-au-Val, 20 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 31 km from Colmar Expo. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi.

The holiday home with a terrace and mountain views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement.

Hiking can be enjoyed nearby.

Würth Museum is 33 km from the holiday home, while House of the Heads is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 37 km from Gîte Les Cerisiers.

Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is 4 km from the centre of Colmar and 2 km from the A35 motorway. This hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a free private parking and a bar. (2 charging station for electric vehicles)

Serviced by a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV, free wifi and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

Breakfast is served every morning at Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar. There is also a bar with terrace on site where guests can enjoy snacks.

Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is a 10-minute drive from the Wine Route of Alsace and right at the opposite of  Colmar Expo Exhibition Centre.
